multipartBodyContent.name: text
multipartBodyContent.value:
Hi {{24.user_full_name}},

Im Olena from ChemDiva global CRO with 30 years in early drug discovery, AI-driven design, and compound libraries. We help teams move past undruggable roadblocks and accelerate small-molecule programs. Weve supported groups at Genentech, Eli Lilly, and a range of biotechs.

If youre open to a quick chat, please grab a time that works for you here: 
https://calendly.com/olena-chemdiv/30min

Best,
Olena Khanasyk
